about_the_game:
Does your game need some electronic music to add the right mysterious tones to a scene? Has your cyberpunk hero been blamed for a crime that they didn’t commit and now needs to prove their innocence, and you need some fitting background tracks? Then it’s time to check out Suspense Music Library Vol.1! TK. Projects’ latest music pack brings you 20 BGMs perfect for setting the scene and keeping your players’ attention on the story.

Features:

* 20 royalty-free songs
* .ogg and .m4a file formats

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
